name: Kingdom Run VR (University of Suffolk)
description:
Award winning final year game Kingdom Run VR was designed and developed by two person team Alarming Ladder Studios! Comprising of Hannah Bull and Daniel Wiltshire.

Kingdom Run VR is an endless, action-adventure runner where players will explore trapped tombs with on-rails movement while dodging traps, collecting gems, and eliminating enemies with their trusty katanas.

Kingdom Run VR won the initial stages of the Tranzfuser competition, won the Barclays Games Innovation Challenge, and was presented at EGX in London!

Browse our course page: https://www.uos.ac.uk/courses/ug/ba-hons-games-development
